糖尿病酮症酸中毒 (Diabetic ketoacidosis) 是因为身体大量地使用脂肪作为能量, 故大量的酮体 (ketone body) 聚集在身体内和血液中.

means.word_mean: 1. acidosis with an accumulation of ketone bodies; occurs primarily in diabetes mellitus
